projectArray.title: Social Media App
projectArray.text: Built with PHP/MySQL. Create an account, make posts, follow and unfollow other users. Built to illustrate various interactions with a database using MySQL.

projectArray.title: Markdown Previewer
projectArray.text: A markdown interpreter, built using React's state management. Includes temporary user-defined session saving.

projectArray.title: Wikipedia API App
projectArray.text: Built to illustrate use of different API endpoint interaction. Run searches in the Wikipedia database, or retrieve random articles. Dark theme also available.

projectArray.title: Weather API App
projectArray.text: A simple API call to retrieve weather information based on ZIP code.

projectArray.title: My Blog
projectArray.text: A multi-page site employing Express and EJS to create site consistency with view templates. Implements same concept behind Markdown Previewer in composition to make more creative Blog posts.

projectArray.title: Random Quote Machine
projectArray.text: A simple React project that calls an API to fetch and display some motivation.

projectArray.title: To-Do List App
projectArray.text: Another database-interaction application, this one implementing the NoSQL language MongoDB/Mongoose.

projectArray.title: Drum Machine
projectArray.text: A drum machine, built using React. Easily scalable with additional banks if desired.

projectArray.title: Newsletter API
projectArray.text: Uses express routing calls to communicate with my Mail Chimp account.
